column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Song says : " You two must not be from around here .
#Text=" Song says : " So where are you traveling from ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Yes , we 're travelers .
#Text=" Song says : " Do you have names ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Names ?
#Text=Of course we have names .
#Text=I 'm , uh ... Lee and this is my Uncle , uh ... Mushi ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Yes , my nephew was named after his father , so we just call him Junior .
#Text=" Song says : " Mushi and Junior , huh .
#Text=My name is Song .
#Text=You two look like you could use a good meal .
#Text=Why do n't you stay for dinner ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Sorry , but we need to be moving on .
#Text=" Song says : " That 's too bad .
#Text=My mom always makes too much roast duck .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Where do you live exactly ?
#Text="
